info.p: This format corresponds to the withdrawn ISO 24613:2008 standard, devoted to the description of (mostly machine-readable) lexicons. It is superseded by a TEI-based format, defined by ISO 24613-4:2021. The 2021 format is not backwards-compatible.
The 2008 format (indeed, subsets of it) were used by several tools, most (all?) of which are not offered online any longer.
For more information on the legacy LMF format, see:

ul.li: LMF Wikipedia page that, as of May 2024, provides information on the withdrawn standard
